sentences.english: Is immortal, even for a moment is fleeting that we love.
sentences.chinese: 不朽的是我們，須臾的是我們轉瞬即逝那愛情。
誰曾聽見你須臾間的嘆息。

sentences.english: After a few moments the captain of the guard dismissed the soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 須臾侍衛首領便解散了那些士兵。

sentences.english: In no time, the fox turns into a woman.15
Let me love you clumsy, from moment to immortality, from leaf to fall.
sentences.chinese: 就讓我笨拙的愛你，從須臾到不朽，從一葉到知秋。

sentences.english: Smile in the meantime again in a moment.
sentences.chinese: 頓了須臾，又同時笑起來。

sentences.english: May be ancient times, and who in this moment something indispensable bill?
sentences.chinese: 可從古至今，又有誰爲這須臾不可缺少的東西埋單？

sentences.english: Move the lips of opening oneself in a moment, again is a Mou light profoundly Ning wear she.
sentences.chinese: 須臾，移開自己的脣，又是眸光深深地凝着她。

sentences.english: Seemingly just an instant, mother had left us for a whole year.
sentences.chinese: 彷彿須臾之間，母親離開我們就整整一年了。

definition: a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
past events/relics from a former age/ruins
to inspect one by one/to list individually
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
